XPathFunctionsChoose.summary: The choose function returns one of the specified objects based on a boolean parameter.

blockquote.para: Note: This method should be used instead of if (), which has been deprecated.

XPathFunctionsChoose.returns:
If the boolean parameter is true, the first object is returned; otherwise, the second object is returned.
NOTENote: All parameters are evaluated, even the one that's not returned.
